languages.text:
Trigger Perilsof the Warp (except demon summoning) on every enemy excluding {g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}Warp Creatures{/g} in relaying area as if they had 5 Psy Rating.
!Note! This effects don't count for ""when perils of the warp triggers""-like effects

traits.locale_text:
Trigger Perilsof the Warp (except demon summoning) on every enemy excluding {g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}Warp Creatures{/g} in relaying area as if they had 5 Psy Rating.
!Note! This effects don't count for ""when perils of the warp triggers""-like effects

languages.text: When this ability is used, every enemy in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, except daemons with the {g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}Warp Creature{/g} feature, triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, as if their {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is equal to 5. It cannot cause daemon summoning. Note: this does not count as triggering perils of the warp for effects that depend on it.

traits.locale_text: When this ability is used, every enemy, except daemons with the {g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}Warp Creature{/g} feature, in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, as if their {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is equal to 5. It cannot cause the daemon summoning. Note: this does not count as triggering perils of the warp for effects that depend on it.

When this ability is used, every enemy in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, except daemons with the {g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}Warp Creature{/g} feature, triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, as if their {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is equal to 5. It cannot cause daemon summoning. Note: this does not count as triggering perils of the warp for effects that depend on it.

When this ability is used, every enemy in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, except daemons with the {g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}Warp Creature{/g} feature, triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, as if their {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is equal to 5. It cannot cause daemon summoning. Note: this does not count as triggering perils of the warp for effects that depend on it.

languages.text: При активации каждый враг в радиусе 4 клеток от псайберворона, кроме демонов со свойством {g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}Детище варпа{/g}, вызывает {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозы варпа{/g}, как если бы его {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} был равен 5. Проявление угроз варпа может быть любым, за исключением появления демона. Примечание: не считается условием активации эффектов, срабатывающих при проявлении угроз варпа.
languages.original_text: When this ability is used, every enemy, except daemons with the {g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}Warp Creature{/g} feature, in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, as if their {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is equal to 5. It cannot cause the daemon summoning. Note: this does not count as triggering perils of the warp for effects that depend on it.

traits.locale_text: Когда фамильяр использует эту способность, каждый враг в радиусе 4 клеток от псайберворона, кроме демонов со способностью {g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}Детище варпа{/g}, вызывает {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозы варпа{/g}, как если бы его {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} был равен 5. Это не может стать причиной появления демона. Примечание: это не вызывает эффектов, которые срабатывают при вызове угроз варпа.

Когда фамильяр использует эту способность, каждый враг в радиусе 4 клеток от псайберворона, кроме демонов со способностью {g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}Детище варпа{/g}, вызывает {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозы варпа{/g}, как если бы его {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} был равен 5. Это не может стать причиной появления демона. Примечание: это не вызывает эффектов, которые срабатывают при вызове угроз варпа.

При активации каждый враг в радиусе 4 клеток от псайберворона, кроме демонов со свойством {g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}Детище варпа{/g}, вызывает {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угрозы варпа{/g}, как если бы его {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} был равен 5. Проявление угроз варпа может быть любым, за исключением появления демона. Примечание: не считается условием активации эффектов, срабатывающих при проявлении угроз варпа.

languages.text: このアビリティを使用すると、サイバーレイヴンの周囲4マス以内のすべての敵（{g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}<歪み>の生物{/g}特性を持つデーモンを除く）が、{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}が5であるかのように{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な歪み{/g}を発動する。デーモン召喚は発生しない。 これは、危険な歪みに依存する効果の発動としてはカウントされない。
languages.original_text: When this ability is used, every enemy, except daemons with the {g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}Warp Creature{/g} feature, in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, as if their {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is equal to 5. It cannot cause the daemon summoning. Note: this does not count as triggering perils of the warp for effects that depend on it.

traits.locale_text: このアビリティを使用すると、サイバーレイヴンの周囲4マス以内のすべての敵（{g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}<歪み>の生物{/g}特性を持つデーモンを除く）が、{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}が5であるかのように{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な歪み{/g}を発動する。デーモン召喚は発生しない。 これは、危険な歪みに依存する効果の発動としてはカウントされない。

languages.text: Wird diese Fähigkeit eingesetzt, aktivieren alle Gegner in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Psitech-Raben (mit Ausnahme von Dämonen mit dem Merkmal {g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}Warpkreatur{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g}, als betrüge ihr {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} 5. Kann keine Dämonen beschwören. Hinweis: Löst "Gefahren des Warp" nicht für Effekte aus, die davon abhängen.
languages.original_text: When this ability is used, every enemy in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, except daemons with the {g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}Warp Creature{/g} feature, triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, as if their {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is equal to 5. It cannot cause daemon summoning. Note: this does not count as triggering perils of the warp for effects that depend on it.

traits.locale_text: Wird diese Fähigkeit eingesetzt, aktivieren alle Gegner in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Psitech-Raben (mit Ausnahme von Dämonen mit dem Merkmal {g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}Warpkreatur{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g}, als betrüge ihr {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} 5. Kann keine Dämonen beschwören. Hinweis: Löst "Gefahren des Warp" nicht für Effekte aus, die davon abhängen.

languages.text: Bu kabiliyet kullanıldığında ruhsiber kuzgunun etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm düşmanlar ({g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}Öteboyut Yaratığı{/g} özelliğine sahip iblisler hariç), {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi dereceleri{/g} 5'e eşitmiş gibi {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}öteboyut tehlikelerini{/g} tetikler. İblis çağrılmasına sebep olmaz. Not: Bu durum, ona bağlı etkiler için öteboyut tehlikelerini tetiklemiş sayılmaz.
languages.original_text: When this ability is used, every enemy in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, except daemons with the {g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}Warp Creature{/g} feature, triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, as if their {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is equal to 5. It cannot cause daemon summoning. Note: this does not count as triggering perils of the warp for effects that depend on it.

traits.locale_text: Bu kabiliyet kullanıldığında ruhsiber kuzgunun etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm düşmanlar ({g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}Öteboyut Yaratığı{/g} özelliğine sahip iblisler hariç), {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi dereceleri{/g} 5'e eşitmiş gibi {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}öteboyut tehlikelerini{/g} tetikler. İblis çağrılmasına sebep olmaz. Not: Bu durum, ona bağlı etkiler için öteboyut tehlikelerini tetiklemiş sayılmaz.

languages.text: Lorsque cette capacité est utilisée, chaque ennemi (à l'exception des démons possédant la caractéristique {g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}Créature du Warp{/g}) se trouvant dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de la psyber-corneille déclenche {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Périls du Warp{/g}, comme si leur {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} était égal à 5. L'utilisation de cette capacité ne déclenche pas d'invocation de démon. Remarque : les effets dépendant de Périls du Warp ignorent ce déclenchement.
languages.original_text: When this ability is used, every enemy in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, except daemons with the {g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}Warp Creature{/g} feature, triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, as if their {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is equal to 5. It cannot cause daemon summoning. Note: this does not count as triggering perils of the warp for effects that depend on it.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque cette capacité est utilisée, chaque ennemi (à l'exception des démons possédant la caractéristique {g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}Créature du Warp{/g}) se trouvant dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de la psyber-corneille déclenche {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Périls du Warp{/g}, comme si leur {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g} était égal à 5. L'utilisation de cette capacité ne déclenche pas d'invocation de démon. Remarque : les effets dépendant de Périls du Warp ignorent ce déclenchement.

languages.text: Cuando se usa esta capacidad, todos los enemigos situados en un radio de 4 casillas alrededor del psicocuervo (excepto los daemons que posean el rasgo {g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}Criatura de la disformidad{/g}) provocan {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g} como si tuviesen un {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} de 5. Esto no puede causar la invocación de daemons. Nota: esto no cuenta como una provocación de fatalidades de la disformidad en lo que respecta a otros efectos que dependan de ello.
languages.original_text: When this ability is used, every enemy in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, except daemons with the {g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}Warp Creature{/g} feature, triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, as if their {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is equal to 5. It cannot cause daemon summoning. Note: this does not count as triggering perils of the warp for effects that depend on it.

traits.locale_text: Cuando se usa esta capacidad, todos los enemigos situados en un radio de 4 casillas alrededor del psicocuervo (excepto los daemons que posean el rasgo {g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}Criatura de la disformidad{/g}) provocan {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g} como si tuviesen un {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} de 5. Esto no puede causar la invocación de daemons. Nota: esto no cuenta como una provocación de fatalidades de la disformidad en lo que respecta a otros efectos que dependan de ello.

languages.text: 使用此能力时，距离生化渡鸦4格内的所有敌人（除了拥有{g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}亚空间生物{/g}特性的恶魔之外），都会立刻触发{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}，且该生物的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}视为5级。此次亚空间的威胁不会触发恶魔召唤效果。 注：尽管此能力会引发亚空间的威胁效果，但并不视为触发了亚空间的威胁。
languages.original_text: When this ability is used, every enemy in a 4-cell radius around the psyber-raven, except daemons with the {g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}Warp Creature{/g} feature, triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}, as if their {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is equal to 5. It cannot cause daemon summoning. Note: this does not count as triggering perils of the warp for effects that depend on it.

traits.locale_text: 使用此能力时，距离生化渡鸦4格内的所有敌人（除了拥有{g|f:de9ae96560504c13af0825e60e397b2c}亚空间生物{/g}特性的恶魔之外），都会立刻触发{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}，且该生物的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}视为5级。此次亚空间的威胁不会触发恶魔召唤效果。 注：尽管此能力会引发亚空间的威胁效果，但并不视为触发了亚空间的威胁。
